title: 140: LISTEN TO YOUR HEART: Episode 1 ("Hi, I’m a Singer/Songwriter")
itunes:title: 140: LISTEN TO YOUR HEART: Episode 1 ("Hi, I’m a Singer/Songwriter")
description:
Well it’s official, The Broads are LOVING The Bachelor’s latest endeavor “LISTEN TO YOUR HEART” - they didn’t it was possible but musical miracles happen apparently. First they chat about some Bach Nation news - then they dive into the first episode of the High School Musical version of The Bachelor. The Broads chat the cast, the fashion, their favorites, the red flags, the VAST amount of accessories, Michael Todd, their “likely” unpopular Trevor opinion, the new love of their lives, and much more. They can’t wait to continue to recap this new series - thanks for joining us, Broads!
SCHEDULE: 
***THURSDAY APRIL 16th: Love is Blind recap finale (ep 9,10,&11)
INSTAGRAM:
Chatty Broads: @chattybroads
Bekah: @bekah
Jess: @thebaddmom
